channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: Dashlane's $24 Essentials plan lets you to access your passwords on two devices
item.description: Password manager Dashlane has introduced a new essentials tier to its pricing structure.

item.title: Facebook jumpstarts newsletter ambitions with $5 million for indie writers
item.description: The company will prioritize reporters who plan to cover marginalized communities.

item.title: Instagram tries to take on Clubhouse with audio-only livestreams
item.description: Facebook has introduced a new feature inside of Instagram Live that allows you to turn off your phone’s camera when broadcasting.

item.title: 'Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order' PS5 and Xbox Series X/S update arrives this summer
item.description: Folks who bought the PS4 or Xbox One version will get the upgrade for free.

item.title: This web app uses computer vision to teach you the ASL alphabet
item.description: Fingerspelling.xyz is a web-based experience that takes advantage of computer vision software to make the process of learning the ASL alphabet fun and easy.

item.title: Coinbase now lets US users pay for cryptocurrency through a PayPal account
item.description: Starting today, PayPal users in the US can link their accounts to Coinbase to make it easier to buy digital currencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum and Litecoin.

item.title: NYPD stops using Boston Dynamics' robodog following backlash
item.description: The police force canceled its $94,000 lease and will return the robot to the company.

item.title: Grow your business online with GoDaddy’s new offering
item.description: GoDaddy Websites + Marketing makes it easy to grow your brand or business online using a variety of powerful SEO and marketing tools.

item.title: EU approves rules for rapid takedown of online terrorist content
item.description: Platforms will have an hour to remove such material or face possible fines.

item.title: Snap's latest diversity numbers are almost unchanged from last year
item.description: Snap published its second-ever diversity report, which confirms the company is still overwhelmingly white and male.

item.title: Spotify makes it easier to navigate your library on the go
item.description: Today, Spotify is finally modernizing its experience with a completely redesigned Your Library section, which will start rolling out to Android and iOS users over the next week.

item.title: Microsoft follows Epic and cuts Xbox PC revenue share to 12 percent
item.description: 'It seems a good time to do that,' Xbox Game Studios head Matt Booty said.

item.title: Linksys' first WiFi 6E routers are now available to buy
item.description: Linksys has launched its first WiFi 6E-certified systems.

item.title: Ford, BMW and Honda cut production due to global chip crisis
item.description: Car makers Ford, Honda and BMW have reportedly joined tech companies Apple and Samsung in flagging production cuts caused by the global chip shortage.

item.title: Gadgets that make great Mother's Day gifts
item.description: Here's a list of gadgets that will make great Mother's Day gifts, as chosen by Engadget editors.

item.title: The Morning After: Samsung's new family of Galaxy Book laptops
item.description: Today’s headlines: iPhone and Mac sales are way up from the start of the pandemic, Samsung unveils a new family of Galaxy Book laptops and CES plans a return as an in-person event in 2022.

item.title: Roku's Streambar falls to $100 at HSN
item.description: You can now pick up a Roku Streambar at HSN for $100, a $30 discount and one of the best prices we've seen yet.

item.title: Amazon to increase the pay of over 500,000 workers amid union battles
item.description: Amazon will give workers a pay rise of between 50 cents and $3 as part of an early wage review, the retailer said on Wednesday.

item.title: Sony begins selling the PS5 in China
item.description: Sony has officially launched the PlayStation 5 in China ahead of Microsoft's Xbox consoles.

item.title: Microsoft is fixing the pain of arranging Windows 10 apps on multiple displays
item.description: If you use a multi-monitor setup on Windows 10 for gaming, work or because they're built right into your laptop, Microsoft has some good news.

item.title: Apple Watch Series 6 price falls again to a new low of $249
item.description: The Apple Watch Series 6 Product Red edition is now down to $249 at Best Buy, marking an all-time low for the bestelling smartwatch.

item.title: Atomos Ninja V+ brings 8K ProRes RAW support to Canon's EOS R5
item.description: Atomos has introduced a new external recorder/monitor that makes 8K or 4K 120p ProRes RAW recording possible on select mirrorless and pro cameras.

item.title: Bang & Olufsen's Beolab 28 is a $14,750 pair of connected speakers
item.description: Bang & Olufsen's latest high-end wireless speakers are equipped mechanical curtains that move to adjust how the speakers project sound.

item.title: NASA wants to go farther and faster for fourth Mars helicopter flight
item.description: NASA has announced that the helicopter's fourth flight is scheduled to take off on April 29th at 10:12 AM Eastern time.

item.title: Samsung's profits rose in Q1, but the chip shortage looms over Q2
item.description: Samsung's consumer electronics profits hit a new record high for Q1, but the company warned investors that sales will slow in Q2 due to component shortages.
